synopsis.native: Juliane, commissaire de police à Paris, est une femme d’une grande intégrité morale. Mais la découverte de la double vie de son mari va soudain la conduire à commettre des actes dont elle ne se serait jamais crue capable…
synopsis.english: Juliane, a police commissioner in Paris, is a woman with great moral integrity. But when she discovers her husband’s double life, she starts committing acts she never would have thought herself capable of…
